SkySaver System

The skysaver unit is a simple projects designed to fight fires automatically preventing any posible damages from fire.

It's well equipped in terms of sensors and the preripherals to accomplish the fire fighting process. Its also has the capability to make phonoe calls in case of fire outbreaks, it will alert owners in case the sensors sense even very low levels of flame or smoke at unwanted time. It also rings a fire siren to alert those near of a fire event.

Technology

The entire system fights the fire single handedly without any human intervention, it just notifies you, there was some fire outbreak but I fearlessly fought it.

Tools I use


SolidWorks 2018

Arduino

Eagle CadSoft
